emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Smart Contracts
emerging_technologies.description: Contracts that execute and enforce themselves using AI to adapt to changing conditions or breaches.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces need for legal disputes, increases efficiency but raises concerns about AI bias and job displacement.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High due to cost savings and efficiency, but adoption will be moderated by regulatory frameworks.

emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Space Operations
emerging_technologies.description: Use of DAOs for managing space missions, satellite operations, and interplanetary settlements.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Opens space exploration and utilization to broader participation, potential for space law conflicts.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Initial adoption by private space companies, later by international bodies.

emerging_technologies.name: Tokenized Cognitive Enhancements
emerging_technologies.description: Cognitive enhancements can be purchased, sold, or traded as tokens, enabling a market for brain augmentation.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could lead to cognitive inequality; ethical considerations on human enhancement.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Dependent on the acceptance of neural interfaces and regulatory approval.

mainstream_technologies.name: Zero-Knowledge Applications
mainstream_technologies.description: Applications that enable privacy-preserving transactions and data exchanges.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread adoption in finance, healthcare, and identity verification sectors.

mainstream_technologies.name: Decentralized Energy Grids
mainstream_technologies.description: Energy grids managed via blockchain for local production, consumption, and trading.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Increasingly adopted in regions with high renewable energy penetration.

epoch_themes.description: A shift towards systems where control is distributed rather than centralized, enhancing security and reducing single points of failure.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes inclusivity, reduces power concentration, but challenges existing governance models.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased push for digital democracy, transparency in operations, and data privacy.

epoch_themes.description: Enhancing human capabilities through technology, focusing on cognitive and physical enhancements.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential for new social divides based on access to enhancements; redefinition of human capabilities.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Ethical debates on enhancement, regulatory frameworks for new technologies.
